item.description:
Hello Football (Soccer) Fans!

We'll be watching some of action from the World Cup of Soccer on Saturday 26 at the Greatest Bar in Boston. These will be the first two matches from the round of 16 (Single Elimination). There is a good chance that England will be playing in one of the matches... Please let me know if you'll be coming so I can make a reservation with the bar.

See you then!

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: World Cup - Round of 16
